Potential Volume list for March Cc This is potential new volume for March Counterparty Meter Volume Mid Month Gas Daily Cico Oil Gas Co TBA MMbtu per day Yes This number is NOT in Vances production estimate This well is anticipated to come on the first week of March but earlier is possible Please let me know if you need any additional information Susan Smith x

Lindholm Oil Inc Cc Oil Inc MMbtud Gas Daily less I will create a committed reserves ticket for the remaining term of the deal once our geologists have gathered enough data to forecast the reserves of this well at such time we will request that this ticket be zeroed out Please supply the sitara number once entered If you have any questions please give me a call Susan x Forwarded by Susan SmithHOUECT on PM Vance L Taylor AM To Tom NRON cc Bryan CT Daren J CT Julie CT Susan CT Donald P CT Melissa CT Subject Union Gas Doehrman Tom The Doehrman well came on line for first delivery on Monday at am The contract calls for intramonth pricing for deliveries that commence after the first day of the month Please create a one month baseload firm deal ticket for the remaining days of the month based on the following information Counterparty Meter Volume Price Union Gas Operating Company mmbtud Gas Daily less Susan will create a committed reserves firm ticket for the remaining term of the deal once our geologists have gathered enough data to forecast the reserves of this well at such time we will request that this ticket be zeroed out If you have any questions or concerns please give me a call Thanks vlt x

Potential Well head January Cc The following is the potential new wellhead volume for January that I am currently aware of This was not included in the production estimate number given by Vance EOGHortense Polk County New Meter Mmbtu day Brayton Operating Brayton Drushell Jackson County Possibly new meter or Meter Mmbtuday Let me know if you have any questions Susan x

January Production Estimate Cc I did not receive any more customer nominations Therefore the attached file should not have changed from what was provided to Carlos last week Please let me know if you have any questions Thanks SCS x Forwarded by Susan SmithHOUECT on AM Vance L Taylor PM To Susan CT cc Melissa CT Subject January Production Estimate Susan Please see the attached file for Januarys production estimate This is pretty much the final estimate except that I have calls in to Costilla Walter Superior They both said that they would fax their nom once it was complete Hopefully this will be by Monday If not all of the traders have reviewed the estimate and made their changes I feel pretty confident that this is a good number However if your should receive any noms before Monday at noon please update the file and send it to Carlos and Daren Thanks and Merry Christmas to you and yours vlt x

Crosstex Energy Services Driscoll Ranch Duval Cty Tx Cc Forwarded by Susan SmithHOUECT on PM Enron North America Corp From George Weissman PM To Melissa CT cc JoAnne nron Donald P CT Susan CT Vance L CT Kreg CT Christy CT Jerry nron Subject Crosstex Energy Services Driscoll Ranch Duval Cty Tx fyi Forwarded by George WeissmanHOUECT on PM Jerry Bubert PM To Shawna CT cc Brian M CT George CT Robert CT Kimberlee A CT Christy CT Subject Crosstex Energy Services Driscoll Ranch Duval Cty Tx Crosstex has requested Gas Daily pricing for the above wells for the period Please prepare a Transaction Agreement for use with Gas Daily pricing transactions formed under Section of the Gas Purchase Agreement with Crosstex with the following terms Term February through February Delivery Points HPL Meter Nos and First MMBTUD in the aggregate at the base price of IF HSC less Gas delivered in excess of the MMBTUD in the aggragate at GDA HSC less Thanks Jerry
